altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.ja: 虐殺ハッピーエンド

description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

description.en:
"I did it again...!"

The Hero who can't seem to set out on his journey!!

The protagonist, who was reincarnated into another world, becomes a hero and receives the task of defeating the Demon King. To repay the world that accepted him , he decides to set out on a journey... However, he can't seem to leave the first village, as he is constantly tempted by charming heroines such as the female priestess, his childhood friend who is a magician, and so on!

Thus, the birth of the "I did it again...!" type hero!

A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

description.en:
"A useless thing like you has no value in our family. Take this money and leave immediately!"

"Yes! Goodbye!"

She became the incompetent villainess who commits wrongdoings in order to earn the love of her fiancé, the male lead. Her reputation was already at rock bottom and the main characters, who can't live without each other, are having an affair.

"Getting kicked out and receiving money is good enough!"

So after she was kicked out, she set up a stationery store in front of a school. She reminisces of snacks, beer candy, and even bubbles! Just you wait, kids! But… somehow her young customers are a little weird?

"I'll find you a handsome and modest man, and not someone who has an affair like my brother!"

"Ha, then what about my brother, the crown prince?”

"…the tower master is the best."

The great magic swordsman, the crown prince, the villainous tower master, and finally, the hidden villain. The stationery store, which she thought would be peaceful, left her with no rest.

*Help me! I just wanted to live a normal life!*

---
What's a girl to do when she wakes up in the body of a villainess? Meldenique Babelloa is a supporting character in a romance novel starring her fiancé, Duke Lennox Hessman, and… her sister, Sheria! Heartbroken, she eventually dies a tragic death as a villainess… or so the original story goes. Determined not to follow the script, Meldenique resolutely abandons her old life and sets out to open… a stationery shop! Will she succeed in defying fate and building the stationery shop of her dreams?

description.fr:
«Une chose inutile comme toi n’a aucune valeur dans notre famille. Prends cet argent et pars immédiatement!»

«Oui! Au revoir!»

Elle est devenue la méchante incompétente qui commet des actes répréhensibles afin de gagner l’amour de son fiancé, le protagoniste. Sa réputation était déjà au plus bas et les personnages principaux, qui ne peuvent pas vivre l’un sans l’autre, ont une liaison.

«Se faire virer et recevoir de l’argent, c’est déjà bien!»

Ainsi, après avoir été mise à la porte, elle a ouvert une papeterie devant une école. Elle se souvient des snacks, des bonbons à la bière, et même des bulles ! Attendez, les enfants ! Mais… ses jeunes clients sont un peu bizarres?

«Je te trouverai un homme beau et modeste, et pas quelqu’un qui a une liaison comme mon frère!»

«Ha, alors qu’en est-il de mon frère, le prince héritier?»

«…le maître de la tour est le meilleur.»

Le grand épéiste magique, le prince héritier, le méchant maître de la tour, et enfin, le méchant caché. La papeterie, qu’elle pensait être paisible, ne lui laissait aucun répit. Aidez-moi! Je voulais juste vivre une vie normale!

description.ko:
남주의 약혼녀이지만, 그의 사랑을 받기 위해 악행을 저지르는 무능한 악녀에 빙의했다. 
이미 평판은 밑바닥이고, 서로 죽고 못 사는 주인공들은 저들끼리 불륜까지 막 저지르는 막장 상황. 

"너 같이 쓸모 없는 것은 우리 가문에 있을 가치가 없다. 이 돈을 받고 썩 꺼지거라!"
"네! 안녕히 계세요!" 

그래서 냉큼 돈 받고 쫓겨나 학교 앞에 추억의 문구점을 차렸다. 
추억의 쫀드기, 맥주사탕, 비눗방울 놀이까지! 어린이들 기다려! 

그런데.... 어쩐지 내 어린 고객님들이 좀 이상하다? 

"내가, 우리 오빠 같은 불륜남 말고 잘생기고 조신한 남자 찾아 줄게요!"
"헉, 그럼 황태자이신 우리 형님은 어때?" 
"....마탑주님이 최고야." 

그렇게 위대한 마검, 차기 황태자, 악역인 마탑주, 그리고 최종 흑막까지 엮이게 되면서 
평화로울 줄만 알았던 문구점에는 하루도 바람 잘 날이 없는데. 

살려줘! 난 그냥 평범하게 살고 싶었을 뿐이라고!

description.pt:
O que uma garota deve fazer quando acorda no corpo de uma vilã? Meldenique Babelloa é uma personagem coadjuvante em um romance estrelado por seu noivo, o duque Lennox Hessman, e… sua irmã, Sheria! Com o coração partido, ela eventualmente morre uma morte trágica como uma vilã… ou assim diz a história original. Determinada a não seguir o roteiro, Meldenique abandona resolutamente sua antiga vida e se propõe a abrir... uma papelaria! Será que ela conseguirá desafiar o destino e construir a papelaria dos seus sonhos?

description.ru:
"Такая бесполезная вещь, как ты, не имеет ценности в нашей семье. Возьми эти деньги и немедленно уходи!"
 "Хорошо! Прощай!"
Она стала некомпетентной злодейкой, которая совершает проступки, чтобы заслужить любовь своего жениха, главного героя.
Её репутация уже была на дне, и главные герои, которые не могут жить друг без друга, заводят роман.
" Быть выгнанным и получать деньги - это хорошо!"
Поэтому после того, как её выгнали, она открыла магазин канцелярских товаров перед школой. Она продаёт закуски, пивные конфеты и даже пузыри! Погодите, детки!
Но… почему-то её молодые клиенты немного странные?
"Я найду тебе красивого и скромного мужчину, а не такого , у которого есть роман, как у моего брата!"
"Ха, а что насчет моего брата, крон-принца?"
"… мастер башни - лучший. *
Великий магический фехтовальщик, следующий кронпринц, злодейский хозяин башни и, наконец, скрытый злодей.
Магазин канцелярских товаров, который, как она думала, будет мирным, не оставлял ей покоя.
Помогите мне! Я просто хотела жить нормальной жизнью!

description.uk:
— Ти ганьбиш ім'я нашої родини. Забирай ці гроші та вали звідси!
-Чудово! Бувай!

Вона прийшла до тями ні на що не здатною злодійкою, яка творила зло, щоб завоювати любов її нареченого, головного героя.

Її репутація і так була на дні, а головні герої, які не можуть жити один без одного, закрутили роман.
-Мене хоч і виперли, але дали гроші - вже непогано!

Після того, як її вигнали з дому, вона відкрила перший магазин канцелярських товарів перед школою. Крім іншого, там продаються закуски, солодощі та навіть жуйка! Ну, дітлахи, тримайтеся!
Але... Чому її юні клієнти такі дивні?

-Я знайду тобі гарного і скромного хлопця, а не дурня, що ходить ліворуч, як мій брат!
-Ха, а як щодо мого брата, наслідного принца?
—Господар Башти просто найкращий.

Великий магічний воїн, королівський принц, жахливий власник вежі та таємничий лиходій.

Мирне життя, яке вона хотіла від магазину канцелярії, обернулася зовсім інакше.
Допоможіть! Я просто хотіла жити нормальним життям!

description.vi:
“Một thứ vô dụng như mày không xứng đáng ở trong gia đình này. Cầm lấy số tiền này và cút đi!” “Được rồi! Tạm biệt!” Cô trở thành một nhân vật phản diện bất tài, thực hiện những hành vi sai trái để giành được tình yêu của vị hôn phu của mình, nam chính. Danh tiếng của cô đã xuống đáy và các nhân vật chính, những người vốn không thể sống thiếu nhau, đang có quan hệ tình cảm với nhau. “Bị đuổi ra ngoài mà được nhận tiền là quá tốt rồi!” Vì vậy, sau khi cô ấy bị đuổi ra khỏi nhà, cô ấy đã mở một cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm ở phía trước của một trường học. Cô ấy hồi tưởng lại về đồ ăn nhẹ, kẹo bia, và thậm chí cả chơi với bong bóng xà phòng! Các em chỉ cần chờ thôi, mấy nhóc à! Nhưng… Không hiểu sao những khách hàng trẻ tuổi của cô lại có chút kỳ lạ? “Em sẽ tìm cho chị một chàng trai đẹp mã và khiêm tốn, và cả chưa từng yêu ai như anh trai em chẳng hạn!” “Ha, vậy còn anh trai em, hoàng thái tử thì sao?” “… Chủ tháp là tuyệt nhất. ” Kiếm sĩ ma thuật vĩ đại, tiếp đó là hoàng thái tử, chủ nhân của tòa tháp tàn độc và cuối cùng là nhân vật phản diện giấu mặt. Cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm mà cô tưởng chừng sẽ yên bình lại khiến cô không nghỉ ngơi được.

description.zh:
“像你这样没用的东西在我们家毫无价值，拿上这笔钱，马上离开!”

“是的!再见!”

她成为了一个无能的女反派，为了赢得她的未婚夫——男主角的爱，她做了很多错事。她的名声已经跌到谷底，而主角们，不能离开彼此，却有了外遇。

“被踢出去收钱就够了!”

在她被赶出来后，她在一所学校前开了一家文具店。她回忆起零食，啤酒糖果，甚至泡泡!孩子们，等着瞧吧!

但不知怎的，她的年轻顾客有点奇怪?

“我会给你找个英俊而谦虚的男人，而不是像我哥哥那样有外遇的人!”

“哈，那我的哥哥太子呢?”

“……塔的主人是最好的。”

伟大的神剑手，下一任王储，恶毒的塔主，隐藏的恶棍。

她本以为她的文具店会很安静，但现在却让她无法休息。

帮帮我!我只想过正常的生活!

description.zh-hk:
她附身在了雖是男主的未婚妻，但卻為了得到男主的愛而做下惡行的無能惡女身上。

風評已經到底了，還身處沒有彼此不能活的主角之間出軌的狗血狀況。

“像你這樣沒用的東西待在我們家族沒有任何價值。拿著這些錢滾吧！” “是！再見！” 所以立刻拿了錢被趕出去，在學校門前開了一家記憶中的文具店。

回憶中的橡皮糖，啤酒糖，再到吹肥皂泡泡！小孩子們等著吧！但是... 我的小客人怎麼有點兒奇怪？

“我，不要我哥哥那樣的出軌男，給你找長得帥的正經男人！” “嗬，那麼我哥哥皇太子怎麼樣？” “.…魔法塔主是最棒的。”

就那樣偉大的魔劍，下一任皇太子，反派魔法塔主，還被牽扯到最終的黑幕之中，本以為很平和的文具店沒有一天風平浪靜。

救救我！我只是想過平凡的生活！

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]

description.en:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
description.ja: 医療魔法が独占された異世界に転移した現役医師・天海唯人。スライム、キマイラ、獣人…はじめて出会う住人たちに驚きながらも、わずかな医療器具と自身の知識で、病魔や怪我に立ち向かう。果たして彼は異世界の住人たちを治療し、苦しむ人々を救うことができるのか。

altTitles.ja: 女殺し屋、引退後のリゾート生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Koroshiya, Intai-go no Resort Seikatsu

altTitles.en: A Female Assassin's Post-Retirement Resort Life

altTitles.es: La vida del asesino en el Resort tras la jubilación

description.id: Niat pembalas dendaman seorang Istri kepada Wanita Pembunuh Bayaran yang telah membunuh Suaminya, sampai dia tahu fakta gelap soal suaminya, dan sebaliknya fakta imut soal si Wanita Pembunuh Bayaran itu…

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール角明

description.en: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: She is the neighbor Angel, I am spoilt by her.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: あ、それポンです！

description.en:
Fluffy Mahjong(?) Comedy!

The recently enrolled high schoolers Sena and Shiori are keen on joining the Mahjong Club, belonging to their senior friends: Natsume and Komachi. However! The Mahjong Club is at risk of disbanding! ...Reason being? That no one there can play mahjong!! 
Will they be able to remember the rules of the game before the club becomes disbanded!?

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!

“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

title.en: Kimi to Nara Koi wo Shite Mite mo

altTitles.ja: 君となら恋をしてみても

altTitles.en: I Could Fall in Love with You

description.en:
Thanks to a past trauma, Amane, a high school student, has given up on the idea of seriously loving anyone.

On the first day of his new life in Enoshima, he met Ryuuji, a boy his age. Ryuuji happened to be Amane's type and he'd also like to hang out with him more. But what started out with light feelings is now beginning to change into something unexpected...
description.ja: 過去のトラウマから真剣に人を好きになることをやめた高校生の天(あまね)は、江ノ島での新生活初日、同い年の龍司(りゅうじ)に出会う。好みの見た目だし一緒に遊びたいなと軽い気持ちだったのに、感情は思わぬほうへ動きだして…？

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

title.en: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 元暗殺者、転生して貴族の令嬢になりました

altTitles.en: A Former Assassin Was Reborn as a Blue-Blooded Daughter

description.en:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
description.ja:
任務に失敗した暗殺者が転生したのは、公爵令嬢のセレナ。「私は元暗殺者。なりすますなんて簡単だ」そう思っていたセレナだが、 頭がお花畑な母親や、彼女を蹴落とそうと周りを欺く義妹などとの感覚のズレに日々いら立ち、生きづらさを感じていた。 
マウントだらけのお茶会に、愛憎ドロドロな学園生活……周囲からの嫌がらせを冷めた目で痛烈にかわしながらも、その冷徹さゆえに疎まれ孤立していくセレナ。 そしてある日、義妹が第二王子と婚約することを知り、ついに家出を決意する。しかしそこに第一王子のエヴァンが現れて--!?
愛を知らない元暗殺者が貴族社会を突き進む、異世界転生コメディときどきラブ!？

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.th: วัยมันส์จอมป่วนก๊วนนักพากย์ !

altTitles.ja: 声優かっ!

description.en:
Kino Hime is a 15 year-old girl who just started her first year in a high school for voice actors (Seiyuu) called Hiiragi Academy. She dreams of becoming the voice of the main character in one of the most popular series in Japan, "Magic Fighter Lovely Blazers". The academy is the number one school which allows students to make their voice acting debuts and also includes other departments such as general education, sports, music, acting, and art.  
  
Of course this Academy is full of celebrities, too. Two of Hime's upperclassmen are none other than the two rising idols of the group "Idol Unit AQUA".  
  
But Hime's dream is hard to fulfill. Her voice is not really suitable for a voice actress and her new classmate Kudou Senri doesn't waste time in pointing that out. Will Hime prove everybody, especially Senri, what she is capable of despite the first appearance?
description.pt-br:
Kino Hime é uma menina de 15 anos que acabou de começar seu primeiro ano em uma escola para dubladores (Seiyuu) chamada Hiiragi Academy. Ela sonha em se tornar a voz do personagem principal de uma das séries mais populares no Japão, "Magic Fighter Lovely Blazers". A academia é a escola número um, que permite aos estudantes fazerem a sua estreia na dublagem, e também inclui mais departamentos: esportes, música, atuação, e arte.

É claro que esta Academia é cheia de celebridades, também. Dois dos colegas de Hime não são outros senão os dois crescentes ídolos do grupo "Idol Unit Aqua".

Mas o sonho de Hime é difícil de se realizar. Sua voz não é realmente adequada para uma dubladora e seu novo colega de classe Kudou Senri não perde tempo em apontar isso. Hime vai provar que todos, especialmente Senri, o que ela é capaz de fazer, apesar da primeira aparição?

altTitles.ja: 君に二度目のさよならを。

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ni Nidome no Sayonara wo.
Kimi ni Nidome no Sayonara o.

description.en:
Harusawa Hinata, who works as a web designer, receives a call that the body of his best friend Sora Otonashi, who disappeared in his second year of high school, has been found.
He attends the wake with his friends from the art club, where Shinohara notices something when he sees a picture Sora drew just before his disappearance. However, Shinohara and Hinata are attacked by someone. When they wake up, they find themselves in "that place" on "that day"!

What is the truth behind their best friend's disappearance and death? And what is the secret hidden in the picture Sora drew?

altTitles.ja: 双星の陰陽師

description.en:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

altTitles.ja: 泣き顔百合アンソロジー

description.en:
"Show me your crying face."
A slightly unique yuri anthology consisting of seven completely original tales centered around the theme of "crying face"! Enjoy each unique "crying face"!

Includes the following chapters:
1. You Are My Ideal
2. Kanojo no Namida ga Amai Riyuu
3. Afureta, Sono Saki
4. Watashi ga Inakya Dame!
5. Kurushii Koi
6. Zatsuon
7. Ne
description.ja:
見せて、あなたの泣き顔。

「泣き顔」をテーマに描く、全7作完全描き下ろしのちょっと特殊な百合アンソロジー!
それぞれの「泣き顔」をお楽しみください!

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô em um lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca em uma jornada sem fim.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.en: The Werewolf Wants to Eat His Favorite Detective

altTitles.ja: オオカミは探偵を食べたい

description.en: I have no confidence that I can "wait"."Werewolf Syndrome" - The spontaneous onset of a strange disease. Those who are affected present symptoms such as attacking and devouring humans. In this world, this is merely an urban legend, but, 10 years ago, Reito's brother was killed by a werewolf. Since then he has spent his life as a lone detective in order to expose the truth behind werewolves. Under such circumstances, he meets his estranged nephew for the first time in 10 years. Reito was briefly surprised to see that Yoru, who used to be a crybaby, is now a dashing university student who towers over him. Shortly after, Yoru suggests that Reito should hire him in the detective agency...?!

Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: あたし、キスした。

description.en:
[from lost-translations]  
With all the intertwines of love, entangled red strings, and perturbed hearts, Mitsui Haruka brings us eight stories that begins by taking that one intense first step.  
  
"Cosa posso fare per dare una mossa alla nostra relazione?"

altTitles.ja: ハレルヤベイビー

description.en: The successor of a yakuza family and his bodyguard who’s head over heels in love with him — the only pacifist in the wild and violent Ousaki Group is its sucessor, Touka. His bodyguard-slash-friend, Miyako, has dedicated his entire being to protecting him, but it seems he’s a tad bit overprotective…?

On the first day of school, six students felt their hearts flutter all at the very same moment in time! This is the story of each of them pursuing and being pursued out of their earnest wishes for love.

Tao Zhi, an infamous figure in Laboratory School 1, dominated the bottom rankings all year round. One day, according to rumour, Miss Tao somehow fell for the legendary academic big boss—the school’s only hope to defeat neighbouring schools, the top scorer in the college entrance exam: Jiang Qihuai. Some research revealed that the boss’s type was someone who was 1) good-natured and 2) good at studying. Those who scored less than 700 points weren’t even worth mentioning. Tao Zhi wasn’t good-natured either, so she started practicing 5 exams/3 years*, turning herself into a ruthless test-answering machine that woke up early and stayed up late to study for 2 weeks, and scored 350 points.

Tao Zhi: Look, I like you so much, how about you let this one go and let me take the test again?

How to conquer a Bking**--from 300 to 700 points--in what world does a lady as beautiful as a flower who comes from a rich family like me get looked down on, isn’t it because you’re a coward king?

*referring to a workbook that simulates 5 college exams and 3 years of school
**internet slang for someone who acts cool/like a king

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 4 「Let's Save the Royal Academy Library!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!

altTitles.ja: ホワイトタイガーとブラックタイガー

description.en:
White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp.

It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).

altTitles.ja: 21世紀少年
二十一世紀少年

description.en:
Growing older is pretty rough and Kenji is finding out just how hard it can be as life starts wearing down on him. On top of trying to make ends meet running a convenience store he has to care for the niece that his missing sister left in his care. Memories of youth make it easier, until those memories come back to haunt him.  
Picking up directly after the events of 20th Century Boys, it seems like the world is finally out of danger, but the mystery of "Friend" still exists. As the world is threatened again, Kenji must search his memories for any clue about "Friend."
description.pt-br: Continuação da obra-prima de Naoki Urasawa, 20th Century Boys

altTitles.ja: 重いギャル
雪と墨

description.en:
Neneo was being hauled through the city for the terrible crime of murdering 50 villagers.
"I will buy you" she said. With one word, Freya, the daughter of a prestigious family, changed his fate as he was about to be beheaded. When Freya loses the battle for the throne and heads off to a remote, cold region, Neneo is ordered as her squire, and he finds himself in the company of a woman who, like himself, is scorned and pitied by the world. The two have different backgrounds and different ways of thinking, but as they confide in each other about their respective circumstances, they come to understand each other.
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: SNSで発表されるや否や大反響を巻き起こした『大罪人と名家の令嬢の物語』、第1巻!!

ネネオは村人50人を殺害した大罪で、市中を引き回されていた。
「その罪人、私が買い取ります」。
斬首される彼の運命をその一言で一変させたのは、名家の令嬢であるフレイヤだった。
家督争いに敗れ極寒の僻地へと向かうフレイヤから従者を命じられたネネオは、
自分と同様に世間から蔑みと憐みを受けている彼女に気づく。
まるで生い立ちも考え方も違う2人だが、
それぞれの事情を打ち明けていく中で、お互いの理解者になっていき…。

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: SNS de happyō sa reru ya inaya dai hankyō o makiokoshita “taizainin to meika no reijō no monogatari”, dai 1-kan! 

Neneo wa murabito 50-ri o satsugai shita taizai de, shichū o hikimawasa rete ita. "Sono tsumibito, watashi ga kaitorimasu". Zanshu sa reru kare no unmei o sono hitokoto de ippen sa seta no wa, meika no reijōdearu fureiyadatta. Katoku arasoi ni yabure gokkan no hekichi e to mukau fureiya kara jūsha o meiji rareta neneo wa, jibun to dōyō ni seken kara sagesumi to 憐 Mi o ukete iru kanojo ni kidzuku. Marude oitachi mo kangaekata mo chigau 2-ridaga, sorezore no jijō o uchiakete iku naka de, otagai no rikai-sha ni natte iki….

description.en:
Down on his luck voice actor Daewon finally lands a huge role, but the only problems is… it's homoerotica! Plus, he'll have to work with Hyunsoo who came out to him as bisexual. Having to move in with the brash guy makes matters worse, when he brings up a past heartbreak. To-do list: Get through the new job, sleep in the right bed, keep my clothes on, keep HIM away!  
  
(Source: TappyToon)

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

altTitles.ja: MASTERキートン

description.en:
Taichi Hiraga-Keaton, who has a Japanese father and an English mother, works as an insurance op (investigator) while teaching archaeology at a university.
He is also a former instructor of survival techniques in the SAS (Special Air Service) of the British army.

Keaton's dream is to work as an archaeologist to discover the mysterious Danube civilization.

In reality, however, he spends his days doing detective work, which is always fraught with danger.

When he is thrown out into the desert, he uses his knowledge as a weapon to survive, and he uses chocolate to disable a bomb planted by terrorists.

He is supported by his daughter Yuriko, who scolds Keaton for his clumsiness, his father Taihei, who is still thriving in his old age, and his partner Daniel, an insurance investigator, while still feeling regret over his ex-wife.



---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/master-keaton)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (cancelled)
description.es-la:
Keaton es el hijo de una mujer inglesa de noble cuna y un zoólogo japonés.Se fue a Inglaterra a la edad de cinco años con su madre después del divorcio de sus padres.

Allí aprendió arqueología en la Universidad de Oxford, donde conoció a su mujer con la que tiene una hija (Yuriko), de la que se divorciaron cinco años después.
Trabaja como operativo/detective para Lloyds de Londres donde es conocido por sus habilidades adquiridas como sargento mayor en el SAS y como veterano de la Guerra de las Malvinas, lo que le ayuda a llevar a cabo su peligrosa labor de investigador de seguros.
A pesar de trabajar para Lloyds, su sueño es excavar la antigua civilización en una cuenca del Danubio.
___
* Su título es "maestro" porque el maestro del campo de entrenamiento de SAS le dijo que no podría ser un "profesor" en su estilo de lucha pero un "maestro" en el mejor de los casos.
* El manga retrata muchas facetas de Keaton: no solo su papel como detective, sino también sus puntos de vista humanistas sobre la naturaleza, la familia y la cultura.
description.pt-br:
Taichi Hiraga-Keaton, que tem um pai japonês e uma mãe inglesa, trabalha como investigador de seguros enquanto leciona arqueologia em uma universidade. Ele também é um ex-instrutor de técnicas de sobrevivência no SAS (Serviço Aéreo Especial) do exército britânico.

O sonho de Keaton é trabalhar como arqueólogo para descobrir a misteriosa civilização do Danúbio.

Na realidade, porém, ele passa seus dias fazendo trabalho de detetive, que sempre está repleto de perigos.

Quando é jogado no deserto, ele usa seu conhecimento como uma arma para sobreviver e utiliza chocolate para desativar uma bomba plantada por terroristas.

Ele é apoiado por sua filha Yuriko, que repreende Keaton por sua falta de jeito, seu pai Taihei, que ainda está florescente em sua velhice, e seu parceiro Daniel, um investigador de seguros, enquanto ainda sente arrependimento por sua ex-esposa.

神様です。サービスするよ
神様と陰気な少年

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.
